name: everything-is-broken
description:
Welcome to Widget Co where everything is broken! Our heroine, Michelle, will be hiring new developers to create new features and fix bugs in order to grow the company.

Try to maximize your ticket close rate while minimizing your costs. Or some such business jargon.

  • Start the game by hiring developers to close tickets.
  • Consolidate individual contributors to increase productivity.
  • Hire a hiring manager to take care of the pesky task of hiring new developers.
  • For HR teams to handle re-organizing the dev teams.
  • At some point, you need to expand the company into a building. Or three!

Have fun!
